content.question: The developments referenced by the image most directly contributed to United States involvement in

choices.label: competition with Russia in opening trade with Japan
the suppression of an independence movement in the Philippines
acquisition of territory from Mexico through the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo
an international monetary system that supported free trade between nations

content.answer: the suppression of an independence movement in the Philippines

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
